T02D1732:97b-1: shukla ae ka dz'a ti s'a dha nam /
T02D1732:97b-3: ral gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1732:97b-4: ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1732:97b-5: padmar gnas pa'i snod mchog la ni yi ge h'um las byung ba'i dkar mo ni //
T02D1732:97b-6: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum zhabs kyis gnas ma nu ma rab rgyas spyan gnyis yang dag dmar //
T02D1732:97b-7: g-yas pas mi rus phreng 'dzin g-yon pas kha ma bye pa'i autpala sngon po bsnams //
T02D1732:97b-8: ral pa kham pa dang ni ldan pa'i lha mos
T02D1732:97b-9: rtag tu khyed la skyong gyur cig / klu brgyad
T02D1732:97b-10: 'jigs rung dang bcas sems kyi dbang phyug dbu rgyan
T02D1732:97b-11: can // snying rje ro yis kun nas gang ba'i ljags bskyod bzhad mdzad ma //
T02D1732:97b-12: ri dags dgra bo'i yi ni pags pa'i na bza' 'chad ba mo //
T02D1732:97b-13: de lta'i sgrol mas mi shes mun pa gsod par
T02D1732:97b-14: byed par shog / dpal ldan gnyis med rdo rje
T02D1732:97b-15: yis // bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes la //
T02D1732:97b-16: btud de rol pas bas pa yis //
T02D1732:97b-17: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brjod par bya //
T02D1732:97b-18: dang por re zhig sngags pas kha bshal ba la
T02D1732:97b-19: sogs pa byas te stan bde ba la nye bar
T02D1732:97b-20: 'dug nas me tog dri zhim po bkram pa'i sa
T02D1732:97b-21: phyogs su ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa bshams la
T02D1732:97b-22: / rang gi snying gar h'um dkar po nye bar blta'o //
T02D1732:97b-23: h'um dkar po de las rang gi ba spu'i bu ga dang /
T02D1732:98a-1: sogs pa'i sgo las 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phro bar bsams te /
T02D1732:98a-2: 'od zer de dag gis gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma
T02D1732:98a-3: snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas ba snang
T02D1732:98a-4: bar byas nas / de nas 'og min na bzhugs
T02D1732:98a-5: pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku
T02D1732:98a-6: mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1732:98a-7: gang yang bdag la gsol ba 'debs pa'i sems can
T02D1732:98a-8: de dag la byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes pa
T02D1732:98a-9: gcig car mdun na 'dug par bsams la /
T02D1732:98a-10: de nas yi ge h'um las me tog bdug spos
T02D1732:98a-11: dri dang phreng ba la sogs pa spros pas mchod
T02D1732:98a-12: do ; / de nas byams pa dang /
T02D1732:98a-18: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang /
T02D1732:98a-19: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1732:98a-20: aom badzra pushpe a'a:h'um zhes pas bsngags pa'i me tog
T02D1732:98a-21: la sogs pa ming spel dang bcas pas dbul lo
T02D1732:98a-22: // de nas bdag dang chos thams cad gdod ma
T02D1732:98a-23: nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom
T02D1732:98a-24: // par bya ste / aom sv'a bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
T02D1732:98a-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02D1732:98a-27: de nas smon lam gyi dbang gis yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po dang /
T02D1732:98a-28: de'i dbus su yi ge tam yongs su gyur pa
T02D1732:98a-29: las thod pa nor bu chu shel lta bu'i 'od
T02D1732:98a-30: can khrag gis yongs su gang ba /
T02D1732:98a-31: de'i dbus su yi ge h'um dkar po 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D1732:98a-32: shin tu mdzes pa de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1732:98a-33: autpala sngon po kha ma bye ba yi ge h'um
T02D1732:98a-34: gis byin gyis brlabs par bltas la /
T02D1732:98a-35: de dag yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D1732:98a-36: sku mdog dkar mo stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris
T02D1732:98a-37: can phyag g-yas pas mi rus kyi phreng ba 'dzin
T02D1732:98a-38: pa / g-yon na autpala sngon po kha ma bye ba bsnams pa /
T02D1732:98a-39: ral pa kham pa gyen du brdzes pa tshangs pa'i gnas kyi bar du shin tu khyab pa /
T02D1732:98a-40: klu gdug pa can brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1732:98b-0: karko ta sngon @98b pos thod byas pa /
T02D1732:98b-1: 'jog po dmar po'i do shal can /
T02D1732:98b-2: dga' bo dang nye dga' bo ser po dag gis rna cha dag dang ldan pa //
T02D1732:98b-3: mtha' yas dkar po'i tshangs skud can /
T02D1732:98b-4: nor rgyas dkar po'i ska rags dang //
T02D1732:98b-5: dung skyong dkar pos phyag gdub byas pa /
T02D1732:98b-6: padma dang padma chen po dmar pos zhabs gdub byas pa /
T02D1732:98b-11: zhabs g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pas ro'i steng du gnas pa /
T02D1732:98b-12: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhal mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa /
T02D1732:98b-14: dpal mi bskyod rdo rje'i cod pan gyis spyi bor brgyan pa /
T02D1732:98b-15: byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pa cig bsgom mo //
T02D1732:98b-16: rang gi snying ga'i h'um dkar po'i 'od zer gyis
T02D1732:98b-17: ye shes sems ma'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bltas te
T02D1732:98b-18: / de nas dza:h'um bam ho: zhes pa dgug pa dang /
T02D1732:98b-22: ye shes sems ma dang chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar dbyer med par blta'o //
T02D1732:98b-23: de nas rje btsun ma'i thugs ka'i padma'i steng du
T02D1732:98b-24: yi ge hr'im shel dag pa'i mdog lta bur 'od
T02D1732:98b-26: bsgoms pa las dub na sngags don dang ldan pa gzhal du med par myur bar dang /
T02D1732:98b-29: mtshang ba spangs nas yid kyis dmigs te bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1732:98b-30: de la sngags btu ba ni sde tshan bdun pa'i
T02D1732:98b-31: bzhi pa la mes yang dag par ldan pa'i yi
T02D1732:98b-32: ge ai yis brgyan cing zla tshes dang thig les
T02D1732:98b-34: ji ltar 'dod pas bzlas pas so //
T02D1732:98b-35: lte ba'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du yi ge h'um shin tu 'bar ba blta'o //
T02D1732:98b-36: de nas phreng ba'i rdog po rnams yi ge hr'im gi gzugs su bltas la /
T02D1732:98b-37: de rgyun ma chad par rang gi kha nas 'thon
T02D1732:98b-38: te lte ba'i lam du zhugs shing kha nas byung
T02D1732:98b-39: bar bsams la / sngags kyi rgyal po yig 'bru
T02D1732:98b-40: gcig po 'dis yid bzhin nor bu ltar sdig pa
T02D1732:98b-41: dang yams thams cad 'jig pa dang /
T02D1732:99a-0: @99a * // dbab pa dang 'gro ba 'khrug par byed pa'i sngags
T02D1732:99a-1: sangs rgyas kyi gsung blo gros brtan pas bzlas par
T02D1732:99a-2: bya'o // 'di lta bu'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas snyan dngags mkhan du 'gyur ro //
T02D1732:99a-4: rdo rje lta bu'i tshig dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1732:99a-7: bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1732:99a-8: khyung gi dbang po ltar srid pa gsum gyi dug med par byed pa dang /
T02D1732:99a-9: myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o //
T02D1732:99a-11: zhes ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sangs rgyas nyid
T02D1732:99a-12: kyang sbyin par byed na dngos grub gzhan lta smos
T02D1732:99a-13: kyang ci dgos / aom a'a:hr'im h'um gh'a ta ya sarba bighn'an h'um phad sv'ah'a /
T02D1732:99a-14: sngags 'dis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1732:99a-15: bcom ldan 'das ma ral pa gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1732:99a-16: dpal gnyis med rdo rje las byung ba slob dpon rol pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1732:99a-18: // / rgya gar shar phyogs pa rendra j'i ga ta
T02D1732:99a-19: la'i pandi ta chen po d'a na sh'i las yul
T02D1732:99a-20: dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas drang srong srin
